research_summary.details: Key files for this task are `docs/SPEC-KIT-045-mini/tasks.md` and `SPEC.md`. The script `scripts/spec-kit/lint_tasks.py` is a required validation tool. Evidence directories under `docs/SPEC-OPS-004-integrated-coder-hooks/evidence/commands/SPEC-KIT-045-mini/` will be populated.

This stage depends on the successful completion and telemetry output of the plan stage, specifically `spec-plan_2025-10-14T15:58:30Z-79323873.{json,log}`. It also relies on the task guardrail telemetry: `spec-tasks_2025-10-14T16:19:16Z-1583422877.{json,log}`.

Task T49 in `SPEC.md` must be updated. The current status needs to be changed to `In Progress`, and all other tasks should not have this status. The branch and evidence columns must be updated to reflect the new `feat/spec-auto-telemetry` branch and the `2025-10-14` evidence sets.
